QuestData.Title: Arming the Rebels
QuestData.Description: The Nightfallen rebellion is growing in number, but they have not fought a real war in ages.$b$bVictoire and Silgryn are doing their best to train the new arrivals and could use an experienced hand.$b$bGo to them and show them some of the skills in battle you have picked up in your travels. We need those Nightfallen ready for battle when the time comes.
